attributes.action: enact financial systems to prevent raping the rainforests of the mind thus to economically secure freedom of thought
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Between copyright (trade secrecy) and copyleft (unrenumerated openness to accountabilty) remains the idea of Intellectual Property. IP is considered a right - unlike the liberty of liberty capital to dispose as one wishes with that under ones control. To secure IP requires an IT fix which is not - within systems allowing that where it is easier to observe propriety and by scale to observe its breach - beyond minds able to conceive the Internet.
This means an innovation rate to create 'money' need be recognised - rather than to allow creativity value to accrue to military powers of regions by chance to innovate - to allow creativity to be directly recompensed rather than held as some sort of patronage from material powers.
A new IPSITs digicash is needed to secure against the rape of the rainforest of the mind.

rejection.details: It is not clear from the title of your petition what action you are requesting the government take. Please rephrase and resubmit.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
